message.content:
cs.SY, cs.NI, cs.CR, cs.SE, cs.IT

Reasoning: 
- cs.SY (Systems and Control): The paper discusses the integration of communication systems and control systems, which falls under the scope of systems and control engineering. 
- cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture): The addition of wireless sensors and actuators and the use of computer networks in control systems make this paper relevant to networking and internet architecture. 
- cs.CR (Cryptography and Security): The paper may also touch on security concerns related to the integration of communication systems and control systems. 
- cs.SE (Software Engineering): The development of a testbed for engineering systems that combine computer networks and control systems may involve software engineering techniques. 
- cs.IT (Information Theory): The paper may also discuss information theory concepts related to the transmission and processing of data in the integrated system.
